help-file.title: HITALL
help-file.content:
Syntax: hitall : hit aggressive monsters hitall all : hit all monsters
This skill allows you to hit all foes in the room simultaneously. Each target may be hit once and only once, regardless of proficiency in "dual wield" or "double attack." Using "hitall", will cause you to be stunned for several rounds of combat, with the amount depending on how many targets you attempted to hit.
